translations.translation: And the Companions of the Left: what of the Companions of the Left?
But those of the left hand -- how (unhappy) those of the left hand --
As for the People on the Left: how miserable will be the People on the Left!
As for the people on the left hand, how miserable they will be!
And those on the left – how (wretched) are those on the left!
And those on the left How will be those on the left
And those of the left hand, how wretched are those of the left hand!
The Companions of the Left (O Companions of the Left!)
And those on the left hand: What of those on the left hand?
Those on the Left: how unfortunate are those on the Left!
And the fellows on the left hand; how miserable Shall the fellows on the left hand be!
And the People of the Left Hand—what are the People of the Left Hand?!
The Companions of the Left Hand,- what will be the Companions of the Left Hand?
And those on the Left Hand Who will be those on the Left Hand?
As for the Companions of the Left
And those on the Left—what of those on the Left?
And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?
[56:41] And those of the left [hand] — what of those of the left [hand]?
642 (And those on the left hand) the inhabitants of the Fire: (What of those on the left hand) what do you know, Muhammad, about the degradation and punishment of the people of the Fire?

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَ } أمَّا { أَصْحَابُ ٱلشِّمَالِ } والشآمة المتصفون بالشقاوة الأزلية
 المنهمكون بالقاذورات الإمكانية { مَآ أَصْحَابُ ٱلشِّمَالِ } [الوقعة: 41] وما حالهم الفضيحة هم مخلدون { فِي سَمُومٍ } نار حارة مسعرة في غاية الحرقة والحرارة
 بحيث تنفذ في مسامات أشباحهم كالريح السموم
 لنفوذ لوازم الإمكان النافذة من مسامات أصحاب الغفلة والضلال

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: يقول الحق جلّ جلاله: { وأصحابُ الشمال ما أصحابُ الشمال } تفظيع لشأنهم، والشمال والمشأمة واحد
